title: Maximize Social Sharing with Your Press Release
text:
PR Newswire Association LLC 
NEW YORK, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- With the soaring popularity of social media and the ever-growing numbers of users that follow, it's clear that social sharing is crucial to PR and marketing professionals worldwide. Social media has changed the way we communicate, and brands are regularly leveraging their press releases on social networks. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150902/263226 
A recent white paper from PR Newswire, Tips for Creating a Press Release that Maximizes Social Sharing , explains the importance of a press release's presence on social media and tips to maximize social sharing for optimal visibility. 
Topics discussed this white paper include: -- Social media's impact on the press release and distribution of content -- Benefits of social media as part of a targeted distribution strategy -- Best practices for making content social sharing friendly - from simple formatting tweaks to including a "Click to Tweet" 
Writing a press release in this increasingly social world involves technique and modernization. Learn how to reach the right audiences with your press release by downloading the white paper here .
